-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local LitJson = LitJson
local DCETHotfix
System.import(function (out)
  DCETHotfix = DCET.Hotfix
end)
System.namespace("DCET.Hotfix", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("JsonHelper", function (namespace)
    local ToJson, FromJson, Clone
    ToJson = function (obj)
      return LitJson.JsonMapper.ToJson(obj)
    end
    FromJson = function (str, T)
      local t = LitJson.JsonMapper.ToObject(str, T)
      local iSupportInitialize = System.as(t, DCETHotfix.ISupportInitialize)
      if iSupportInitialize == nil then
        return t
      end
      iSupportInitialize:EndInit()
      return t
    end
    Clone = function (t, T)
      return FromJson(ToJson(t), T)
    end
    return {
      ToJson = ToJson,
      FromJson = FromJson,
      Clone = Clone
    }
  end)
end)
